.. _22_Config.icl:

**************
22_Config.icl
**************

The file 22_Config.icl is created with the ICL tool on the DGUSTool Tools Menu.
.. figure:: ../../tool-cfg_menu.jpg

This file contains any values that are configured as "boot data" in the DGUSTool project file.
.. figure:: ../../boot_data.jpg


T5LCFG_272480K is coded to load 22_Config.icl when the display powers-up.
